relation: Darrow6 - #10 In response, the pyramid opens, proving once and for all that the ancients were all about style.

Darrow - #61 Orange Kid appears in all of his juicy glory. Unfortunately for Ness, he's about to learn a lesson in lending fruit kids money to make crazy inventions. A lesson that we all should learn at one point in our lives.
Darrow6 - #09 On that day, the legendary King Disco was born.
Darrow6 - #08 Jeff unleashes his inner funk.
